content: add a little bit of fun to your crochet projects with the wtf hat this playful design uses the larksfoot stitch and two colors of soft king cole luxury yak dk yarn to create an eye-catching and cozy accessory the stitch pattern is easy to learn and makes a great statement with minimal effort grab the free pattern from my website or purchase the ad-free pdf right here on ravelry **join the cal newsletter here ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d this is just one of the patterns included in our hat of the month club collection > this pattern will be available as a > free pdf download until april 28 2025 > at 11 59 pm est new york time > 23 59 for cal participants simply > add the pattern to your cart before > 11 59 pm est on april 28th and it will > show as $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on april 27 2025 at 9 00 pm est new york time 21 00 **you can find the matching scarf pattern here ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/wtf-scarf-easy-larksfoot-crochet-pattern/ > this pattern is available for free on > my website which is monetized by ads > if you prefer an ad-free version of > the pattern it is available to > purchase from my pattern shop ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ **newsletter ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
